User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://gatetransfer.com/sitemap.xml

# Block admin and internal pages
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /dist/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /hakkimizda
Allow: /iletisim
Allow: /hizmetlerimiz
Allow: /*-transfer
Allow: /blog/

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
